title: Jurmala City Stadium "Sloka"
info: FK "Spartaks" Jūrmala is spending all home games in "Sloka" stadium. Stadium was renewed in 2007 and now its capacity is 2500 seats. Stadium have UEFA category what allows to spend European competitions matches.

title: Kauguri middle-school football stadium
info: FK "Spartaks" Jūrmala youth team is spending all home games at Kauguri middle-school football stadium. This stadium has a high-quality synthetic field.
